reviewText: My son is a huge Sid the Science Kid fan.  He LOVES this Sid DVD.  Is was worth the purchase.
Title: Sid the Science Kid: Change Happens

reviewText: Love the Sid the Science Kid series, totally exceeds expectations, makes science fun for me and my daughter!
summary: Love the Sid the Science Kid series
Title: Sid the Science Kid: Change Happens

reviewText: I bought this as a gift for a little cousin.  I like the idea of the subjects that Sid, the Science Kid discusses for the little children.  The music is good as well.
Title: Sid the Science Kid: Change Happens

reviewText: Excellent for little children and entertaining enough for older children as well. The science is simple but for a three year old it was informative. I'd recommend these for preschool to kindergarten age children. Even toddlers would enjoy them, however, as they capture a child's interest even if they're not old enough to understand the "science".
Title: Sid the Science Kid: Change Happens

reviewText: OK, the DVD hasn't come out yet, but the show has been on PBS for the last season, and my 4 year old LOVES it.  This show does a great job of explaining things in a fun (and parents, a non-annoying!) way.  My son knows all about germs and decay and all kinds of fun things that don't come up in daily conversation.  Terrific job of making an educational show that is completely fun, too.
Title: Sid the Science Kid: Change Happens

reviewText: I bought as a gift for my relative son, the kid loved it but for now he moved to "Curious Gorge" addiction.
Title: Sid the Science Kid: Change Happens
